experience.title: National Winner - Maverick 2.0 Hackathon
experience.description: • National Winner of ABInBev’s Maverick 2.0 Hack-a-thon among 750+ teams all across India. The only team of sophomores to make it to the final. Awarded with a cash prize of INR 1 lac.• Built a recommendation system for cross-sell and upsell of ABInBev’s products. Used Neural Collaborative Filtering for building the recommendation system.
